title: [SOULO] Ep.204 On Hope and Decision Making
description:
Get your own copy of Ashley’s new book You Turn at youturnbook.com!

 

Where are you living from a place of hope?

 

Take a ride with Ash in this solo episode to discuss the vulnerability, power, and inspiration that lives within hope. Ash shares a few personal stories that are connected to being in hope versus being in denial.

 

If you are facing a tough time, a moment of grief, or a difficult transition in life, Ash shares some insight into how to make decisions for yourself. If you are looking for a moment of inspiration mixed with realism, here is a short episode just for YOU. 

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn

  1. How to figure out where your hope has become delusion. 
  2. The beauty within hope.
  3. How to make decisions using your intuition and experience.

 

 

BEAM

 

Are you ready to feel deeply hydrated?

 

Beam’s elevate hydration powders makes it easy to not only get the electrolytes your body needs but also get digestive balance, enhanced energy, and help with recovery. Every elevate powder is made with a supercharged stack of electrolytes, and there’s never any added sugar or artificial sweeteners.  

 

Visit beamorganics.com/youturn to get 35% off your own variety pack of electrolytes!



BIOPTIMIZER

 

Sick and tired of being sick or tired? 

 

If you want to improve your sleep quality, try Magnesium Breakthrough, the only magnesium supplement I know of that contains 7 different forms of magnesium. 

 

Visit www.magbreakthrough.com/youturn with code YOUTURN10 for a 10% discount on your order.

 

CAKE Publishing

Do you need a writer or publicist to support your business?

 

Visit cakepublishing.com to get your next ghostwriter, copywriter, or publicist.
